DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether study drug effective preventing recurrence atrial fibrillation ( abnormal heart rhythm ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Of Recurrence Of Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic persistent atrial fibrillation require DC cardioversion . Duration AF > 48 hr . < 6 month Concomitant Class I and/or III antiarrhythmic drug . Amiodarone treatment within 3 month study . Other inclusion exclusion criterion determine physician study sponsor .
